title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Critical Thinking Blended Workshop for Health Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational health science theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can construct three or more evidence-based critical questions regarding problems raised in health sciences.
Learners can cite credible sources and perform logical rebuttals two or more times in response to peers’ and instructors’ arguments.
Learners can document at least one instance of revising their position by analyzing evidence presented in forum discussions.
Learners can write systematic evaluation reports comparing similarities/differences by analyzing health policy cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
